title: Light in the darkness: Urban nightlife, analyzing the impact and recovery of COVID-19 using mobile phone data
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 153

Author(s): Enrique Santiago-Iglesias, Gustavo Romanillos, Wenzhe Sun, Jan-Dirk Schmöcker, Borja Moya-Gómez, Juan Carlos García-Palomares
